spec_data.Name: oscap-anaconda-addon
spec_data.Description:
This is an addon that integrates OpenSCAP utilities with the Anaconda installer
and allows installation of systems following restrictions given by a SCAP
content.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 23 Feb 2017 11:39:05 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Anaconda addon integrating OpenSCAP to the installation process
